mapper.select: select a.htreseq, a.htrId, a.htrestars, a.htrecomments, a.htreRegDate, a.hotel_seq, a.hotelmember_htmSeq, b.htmSeq, b.htmId, b.htmEmail, c.htseq, c.htName from hotelreview as a left join hotelmember as b on b.htmSeq = a.hotelmember_htmSeq left join hotel as c on c.htseq = a.hotel_seq where 1=1 and c.htseq = #{htseq} order by a.htreseq desc
mapper.insert: insert into hotelreview ( htrestars, htrecomments, htreRegDate, htrId, hotel_seq, hotelmember_htmSeq ) values ( #{htrestars}, #{htrecomments}, now(), #{htrId}, #{hotel_seq}, #{hotelmember_htmSeq} )
